com.thoughtworks.robot.exception
Class RobotOverlapException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              com.thoughtworks.robot.exception.RobotOverlapException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RobotOverlapException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

A Plateau can allow/disallow two Robot to share same coordinate and this can be controlled by an instance variable allowRobotOverlap in Plateau.This exception will be used to notify an exception situation when a Robot will try to occupy a coordinate which is already occupied by another Robot on same Plateau and Plateau does not allow sharing of same coordinates by two Robots. Right now we are not handling special cases here but we can enhance this Exception class further based in need.

Author:
sshinde
See Also:
Plateau, BasePlateau, Coordinate, Serialized Form
